title: Barbados Cocktail Recipe
full_text:
Barbados Cocktail Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
Crushed ice
1
ounce
Velvet Falernum
1 1/2
ounces
dark rum
, such as
Coruba
3/4
ounce
freshly squeezed juice
from
1 to 2
whole
limes
Directions
Fill mixing glass halfway full with crushed ice. Add falernum, rum, and lime juice. Shake for 15 seconds. Strain into cocktail glass and serve immediately.
Special Equipment
Cocktail shaker and strainer
Rum
